entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
